thread.title: Bomb blasts kill dozens in Nigeria | Politics
thread.title_full: Bomb blasts kill dozens in Nigeria | Politics

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Bomb blasts kill dozens in Nigeria | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
Bomb blasts kill dozens in Nigeria â€“ YouTube
Dozens of people have been killed in series of bomb attacks in northeastern Nigeria.
The bombings took place in a mosque in the city of Maiduguri, where worshippers had gathered for evening prayers. Witnesses said all 42 people in the mosque died. No group has yet claimed the responsibility for the bombings, but officials often blame Boko Haram terrorists for such attacks. The terror group has claimed responsibility for many deadly shootings and bombings in Nigeria since the beginning of its militancy in 2009.
